Likhtman-McLeish theory¶

Create compact linlin data file¶

Module linlin2npz

Reads all the files of the precalculated linlin theory and saves them in a more compact *.npz format

Read compact linlin data file¶

Module readlinlin

Reads the linlin data from the compact *.npz file
